Html:
<mui:LinkGroup DisplayName="Main menu" >
        <mui:LinkGroup.Links>
            <mui:Link DisplayName="Log" Source="/Views/Log.xaml" />
            <mui:Link DisplayName="Settings" Source="/Views/Settings.xaml" />
        </mui:LinkGroup.Links>
    </mui:LinkGroup>
how can i disable LinkGroup like this:
<mui:LinkGroup DisplayName="Main menu" IsEnable="false" >
Enabling and disabling LinkGroups (and links) is currently not supported. I believe there is already an issue for that.
